However , concern post-cessation weight gain report significant barrier quit many smoker . Recently , sibutramine , new serotonin norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor drug , receive FDA approval help people lose weight . Since sibutramine affect neurotransmitter important regulate body weight , reasonable hypothesize may decrease post-cessation weight gain overweight obese smoker quit smoke . To date , study compare sibutramine placebo , way reduce post-cessation weight gain among overweight obese smoker take part behavioral smoking cessation program . Therefore , whether sibutramine effective reduce post-cessation weight gain smoker unknown . Further , give neuropharmacologic effect sibutramine , reasonable speculate medication could also effective help individual quit smoke initially long term . It possible use sibutramine , compare placebo , may result decrease post-cessation weight gain overweight obese individual quit smoking . The use sibutramine may also result increase smoking cessation rate . DESIGN NARRATIVE : This study test hypothesis use sibutramine , compare placebo , result decrease post-cessation weight gain overweight obese individual quit smoking , result increase smoking cessation rate . Participants randomly assign one follow two group : 1 ) sibutramine plus behavioral smoking cessation program ; 2 ) placebo sibutramine plus behavioral smoking cessation program . Assessments include post-cessation weight change smoking cessation rate measure study 9 month follow end study .
